file_content.text: You. Is Darth Baras cross with me? Whatever I've done, I'll undo it!
Maybe you haven't heard, Baras and I are no longer associates.
I don't work for him anymore.
Baras sent me to kill you. You have one chance to save yourself.
[Lie] He wants you dead.
You've done nothing wrong, Slinte.
Relax.
I'm here to find General Greist and Armageddon Battalion.
Oh, I know where they are.
But... uh, Baras expressly told me their assignment is a secret. And that he'd... kill me if I told anyone.
You're in a tough spot, aren't you? Because if I don't get what I want, same result.
I'll kill you if you don't.
Dead if I do, dead if I don't. But if I don't, I'm dead right now, so I guess I do.
I'm not included in that order.
[Lie] He didn't mean me.
I see. Well, I have no reason to doubt you, my lord.
I'll protect you from Baras.
Don't worry about him.
Something tells me sooner or later I'm going to disappoint Baras, so if helping you earns me your protection, I'm in.
General Greist and his men have been ordered to sit tight in a cave system not far from here. Here are the coordinates.
Glad I could be of assistance, my lord.
Baras choked out Commander Lanklyn via holo. What, uh, do you suggest I do the next time Baras calls?
Just don't answer. Make him come here to kill you.
Ignore the call.
Ah, right, right. I'll do you one better--"AWOL" has a nicer ring to it than "dead." So long, my lord.
Who says you're the one who revealed the information?
Play dumb.
Ah. I see. I'll work on being convincing. Thank you. I think.
I'll save you the trouble.
It doesn't matter. [Kill him]
So... unfair....
